Environmental Analyst Job at Zico Petroleum and Marketing Company Limited




        
    

        
        Founded in 1986, Zico Petroleum and Marketing Company Limited (ZPMCL) has grown from a modest beginning into one of Nigeria’s foremost indigenous players in the downstream oil and gas sector. From our lubricant blending plant commissioned in 1994 with a capacity of over 1000 metric tons output monthly, we have steadily built a strong reputation for quality, innovation, and reliability. The company evolved as the 1st Lubricant blending and manufacturing company in the South South of Nigeria with its plant located in Benin City, Edo State.

Our journey has been defined by a clear vision — to be the pacesetter in lubricant manufacturing and petroleum marketing. Over the years, our products have gained recognition and approval from leading regulatory bodies, including the Standards Organization of Nigeria (SON) and the Mandatory Conformity Assessment Programme (MANCAP). Today, ZPMCL operates with a deep commitment to excellence, guided by global best practices, high safety standards, and environmental responsibility. Our dedicated team of professionals continues to deliver energy solutions that power industries, businesses, and everyday life across Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Environmental Analyst
Job Location: Benin, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	An environmental analyst studies the impact of human activities on the environment and develops solutions to protect it.
	Their work involves collecting and analyzing data, conducting research, and creating reports to ensure compliance with environmental regulations and promote sustainability.
	This often includes tasks like monitoring pollution, managing waste, and advising on eco-friendly practices.


Key responsibilities


	Research and analysis: Conduct research and collect data on environmental issues such as pollution, climate change, and resource depletion.
	Impact assessment: Evaluate the potential environmental impacts of projects, policies, and human activities.
	Regulatory compliance: Help organizations ensure they comply with environmental laws and regulations.
	Reporting: Prepare reports and make recommendations for policymakers, management, and regulatory agencies.
	Strategy development: Develop strategies and solutions to minimize negative environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
	Monitoring: Monitor air and water quality, manage waste programs, and support environmental risk assessments.


Method of Application

  "title": "Accountant",
  "description": "Kanselor Business Innovation Campus Limited is a&nbsp;Business operation management, market storm promotion, recruitment, product lauch and sales inventory management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant
Job Location:&nbsp;Abia

Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and highly organized Accountant to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing financial records, ensuring compliance with accounting standards, and supporting the organization with accurate financial reporting.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records.
	Manage accounts payable and receivable.
	Reconcile bank statements and general ledger accounts.
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
	Monitor and track budgets, expenditures, and cash flow.
	Process payroll and ensure statutory deductions are remitted promptly.
	Assist with audits and ensure compliance with financial regulations.
	Coordinate with external auditors and regulatory bodies as required.
	Support management with financial analysis and decision-making.
	Implement and maintain effective internal control systems.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree / HND in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 - 4 years of proven experience in accounting or finance.
	Professional qualification (ICAN/ACCA) is an added advantage.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.
